io.github.daveho.funwithsound

Class Instrument

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.daveho.funwithsound.Instrument

  • public class Instrument
extends java.lang.Object
    An instrument plays notes/sounds as specified by pairs of Melody and Rhythm objects. Instrument objects should only be created by a Composer.

        public boolean hasSoundFont()
        Return whether or not this instrument has a soundfont.
        Returns:

      • addSample

        public void addSample(int note,
                      java.lang.String fileName)
        Add a sample to be played for given note. The entire sample will be played at full volume.
        Parameters:
        note - the note
        fileName - the filename of the sample

      • addSample

        public void addSample(int note,
                      java.lang.String fileName,
                      double startMs,
                      double endMs)
        Add a sample to be played for given note. The specified range of the sample will be played at full volume.
        Parameters:
        note - the note
        fileName - the filename of the sample
        startMs - the start time in milliseconds
        endMs - the end time in milliseconds

      • addSample

        public void addSample(int note,
                      java.lang.String fileName,
                      double gain)
        Add sample to be played for given note. The entire sample will be played using the specified gain.
        Parameters:
        note - the note
        fileName - the sample filename
        gain - the gain

      • addSample

        public void addSample(int note,
                      java.lang.String fileName,
                      double startMs,
                      double endMs,
                      double gain)
        Add sample to be played for given note. The specified range of the sample will be played with specified gain.
        Parameters:
        note - the note
        fileName - the sample filename
        startMs - the start time
        endMs - the end time
        gain - the gain

      • getSampleMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,SampleInfo> getSampleMap()
        Get the map of MIDI note numbers to SampleInfo objects for registered samples.
        Returns:
        the sample map

      • isMidi

        public boolean isMidi()
        Determine whether this is a MIDI instrument.
        Returns:
        true if this is a MIDI instrument, false otherwise
